resources.string:
The player who creates the game will be player 1 and the player who joins the game will be player 2. 

First, a player will be chosen at random to start. The green arrow will indicate which player's turn it is.

The first player will take a picture using the "Take a Picture!" button. The next player will then take their picture, trying to match the first picture's color to the best of their ability. The closer you match the color, the more points you will be awarded!

The player that ended the previous round will then take the first picture on the second round, and both players will continue to take turns taking the first picture and matching with the second. The game ends after each player has gone first 3 times.

The player with the most points at the end of the game wins!
